title: Bug 18915[Preferences] Switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
description: When entering invalid data on any preference page and attempting to switch to another page without fixing the issue, a warning dialog appears instead of the expected error dialog.
OB: When trying to navigate away from a preference page with invalid values, a warning dialog is displayed.
EB: Upon attempting to switch between preference pages with invalid values, an error dialog should be displayed instead of a warning.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open any preference page.
2. Enter invalid data that triggers a warning on the UI.
3. Try to navigate to another preference page without fixing the problem.
4. Observe the warning dialog; it should be an error dialog instead.
